thread.title: Andy Murray’s Adidas Shoes Take Center Stage at U.S. Open
thread.title_full: Andy Murray’s Adidas Shoes Take Center Stage at U.S. Open - WSJ

author: Sara Germano
title: Andy Murray’s Adidas Shoes Take Center Stage at U.S. Open
text:
Andy Murray wore Adidas shoes for his first match of the U.S. Open this week, which wouldn’t be much of an issue except that the British tennis champ has signed a multimillion-dollar endorsement deal with rival Under Armour.
The shoe switch underscores the relative newness of Under Armour Inc.’s sneaker business—the Baltimore-based... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
